    Derive the Maxwell relation

    where TTT is temperature and hence show that

    (∂E∂V)T=−P+T(∂P∂T)V\left(\frac{\partial E}{\partial V}\right)_{T}=-P+T\left(\frac{\partial P}{\partial T}\right)_{V} (∂V∂E​)T​=−P+T(∂T∂P​)V​

    An imperfect gas of volume VVV obeys the van der Waals equation of state

    (P+aV2)(V−b)=RT\left(P+\frac{a}{V^{2}}\right)(V-b)=R T (P+V2a​)(V−b)=RT

    where aaa and bbb are non-negative constants. Show that

    (∂CV∂V)T=0,\left(\frac{\partial C_{V}}{\partial V}\right)_{T}=0, (∂V∂CV​​)T​=0,

    and deduce that CVC_{V}CV​ is a function of TTT only. It can further be shown that in this case CVC_{V}CV​ is independent of TTT. Hence show that
